text.quest1: A big jawbreaker lasts for days.
text.quest1a: That new computer is my first laptop.
text.quest1b: The body has a remarkable ability to heal itself.
text.quest1c: We will be ready for the parade tomorrow.
text.quest1d: Were they the best history students?
text.quest1f: Will you bring lunch for everyone?
text.quest2: You can always leave before the end of the game.
text.quest2a: Can you find the basketball nets?
text.quest2b: I am becoming fatter every day.
text.quest2c: Our team's coach fell ill this morning.
text.quest2d: That milk turned sour too quickly.
text.quest2f: That programmer is really great his job.
